mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM eb_system_menu m right join eb_system_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id right join eb_system_role r on rm.rid = r.id right join eb_system_admin a on FIND_IN_SET(r.id, a.roles) where m.is_delte = 0 and r.`status` = 1 and a.id = #{userId} GROUP BY m.id
